text: Evar tam iṟaivaṉiṉ kaṭṭaḷaikaḷai ēṟṟuk koḷkiṟārkaḷō, avarkaḷukku (atu) aḻakiya naṉmaiyākum; iṉṉum evar avaṉatu kaṭṭaḷaikaḷai ēṟṟuk koḷḷa villaiyō, avarkaḷukku pūmiyiluḷḷa poruḷkaḷ yāvum contamāka iruntu, attuṭaṉ ataippōṉṟa (iṉṉoru) pākavum iruntu (maṟumaiyiṉ vētaṉaiyiliruntu tappittukkoḷḷa) avaṟṟaiyellām mīṭṭup poruḷākak koṭuttuviṭavē virumpuvārkaḷ; (āṉāl itu palaṉai aḷikkātu) avarkaḷukkuk kēḷvi kaṇakku mikavum kaṭiṉamāka irukkum; avarkaḷ taṅkum iṭam narakamēyākum; atu mikavum keṭṭa pukaliṭa(mum āku)m
